subject: Baseball
World Series
Television
Computers and the Internet
Blogs and Blogging (Internet)
Threats and Threatening Messages
lead_paragraph: The Web has made it easy for fans to accuse TV announcers of rooting against their team, but the practice is anything but new.
snippet: The Web has made it easy for fans to accuse TV announcers of rooting against their team, but the practice is anything but new.
